regen.absent_element: making alerts when out of limits
regen.new_specification: The TCS shall provide alerts when the AV exceeds preset limits to ensure safe and efficient operation.

regen.absent_element: alert creation when operations exceed preset limits
regen.new_specification: The TCS shall alert the operator when any UAV operation exceeds predefined airspeed, altitude, or fuel limits to maintain safety and compliance.

regen.absent_element: alert when preset limits are exceeded
regen.new_specification: The TCS shall alert the operator when the preset airspeed, altitude, or fuel limits are exceeded.

label: TCS shall notify the operator when AV performance parameters are out of limits.
absence: action of notifying the operator when AV performance parameters are out of limits.
